title: Mekorei HaRambam LeRashash on Mishneh Torah, Transmission of the Oral Law

titles.text: מקורי הרמב"ם לרש"ש על משנה תורה, מסירת תורה שבעל פה
Mekorei HaRambam LeRashash on Mishneh Torah, Transmission of the Oral Law

enDesc: An exposition of some of the sources for the laws decided upon in Rambam's Mishneh Torah and a discussion of how these sources impact on various commentators' critiques.
